Add a single Endpoint Group

{
    name: <string>,
    calllimit: <int>,
    auth: {
        type: "ip"|"userpwd",
        user: <string>
        pass: <string>
        domain: <string>
    },
    endpoints [
        {
            hostname:<string>,
            description:<string>
        },
        ...
    ],

    prefix: <string>,
    notifications: {
        overmaxcalllimit: <string>,
        endpointfailure: <string>
    },

        cdr_send_interval: <string>
    }

        enabled: <bool>,

        dbuser: <string>,
        dbpass: <string>
    }
}

modules.api.api_routes.generateCDRS(gwgroupid, type=None, email=False, dtfilter=datetime.datetime(1, 1, 1, 0, 0), cdrfilter='')[source]¶

Generate CDRs Report for a gwgroup

Parameters

  • gwgroupid (int|str) – gwgroup to generate cdr’s for

  • type (str) – type of report (json|csv)

  • email (bool) – whether the report should be emailed

  • dtfilter (datetime) – time before which cdr’s are not returned

  • cdrfilter (str) – comma seperated cdr id’s to include

Returns

returns a json response or file

Return type

flask.Response

Update a single Endpoint Group

The gwgroupid can be provided in url path or payload

{
    name: <string>,
    calllimit: <int>,
    auth: {
        type: "ip"|"userpwd",
        user: <string>
        pass: <string>
        domain: <string>
    },
    endpoints [
        {
            gwid:<int>,
            hostname:<string>,

getNumbers(starts_with=None, contains=None, ends_with=None, limit=1000000, offset=None)[source]¶

Get flowroute DID’s associated with accnt

See also

flowroute list numbers

Parameters

  • starts_with – match numbers starting with..

  • contains – match numbers containing..

  • ends_with – match numbers ending with..

  • limit – limit of matched numbers

  • offset – offsets list of numbers returned

Returns

list(*str)
